Name: BadLads
About the game: Enter the neo-noir world of BadLads roleplay , a city ruled by corrupt government officials and dangerous gangsters. You decide your own path within this mysterious city, walk the path of the righteous no matter how hard -- or enjoy the delicious fruits of power and fame. Key Features: Dedicated Massively Multiplayer - play on 100+ slot servers. You are uniquely you - Procedurally generated appearance. Varying look, varying height, and a unique race tied your Steam account. Base Building - Buy a lot and build your dream house/apartment/base/shack. Keys can be leased to friends, so you can build together! Economy - Shift the economy and everyone affected by it by illegally printing money, causing economic downfall for everyone but you! Watch the world change as you become richer. Crafting and Collectables - Find and collect items, craft unique items and earn some cash. Craft the things YOU want to wear. Real Hierarchy - Earn your spot on the ladder, and step on the pests that are out of line. Estate Management - Rent buildings and manage them. Lease them out to other players and earn a pretty buck. Building - Decorate and customize your interiors however you please. Every single building has interior(s). Every nook and cranny be explored. Gangs - Create your very own uniquely named gang, invite others and take over anything you like. Jobs - Pick from 3 unique job paths, and do your best fulfilling contracts and changing the world around you. Day/Night - the city that never sleeps, orchestrate your mischievous plans during the day and strike at night. Dedicated servers. - 100 slots per official server, community servers can go even higher! Host your own persistent world. Voice Chat - Distanced based voice chat and text chat. Text To Speech* - Experience the mighty computer generated voice. (Not available on Linux) Speech To Text - Your voice gets transcribed in real-time. (Not available on Linux) Plugins - Create your own rules and experiences with games WebAssembly based plugins. Hybrid Thirdperson - Some servers allow thirdperson some don't, up to the guy at the top. You can always switch back to firstperson. Thirdperson also has a special orbit camera that you lets you orbit around you character, zoom in for those tense moments. Original soundtrack composed in-house.
